    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>cahi1:data_99677</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Parts of a plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teile eines Betriebes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parties d'une usine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partes de uma planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parti di una pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partes de una planta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the cells, tissues and organs that make up a plant to the building materials used to make a house.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">building materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">house</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">room</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tissue</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Zellen, die Gewebe 
und die Organe, die einen Betrieb zu den Baumaterialien bilden, die 
benutzt werden, um ein Haus zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les cellules, les 
tissus et les organes qui composent une usine aux matériaux de 
construction employés pour faire une maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara as pilhas, os tecidos e 
os órgãos que fazem acima uma planta aos materiais de edifício 
usados fazer uma casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta le cellule, i 
tessuti e gli organi che compongono una pianta ai materiali da 
costruzione usati per fare una casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τα κύτταρα, τους ιστούς 
και τα όργανα που αποτελούν εγκαταστάσεις στα οικοδομικά υλικά 
που χρησιμοποιούνται για να κάνουν ένα σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara las células, los 
tejidos finos y los órganos que hacen para arriba una planta a los 
materiales de construcción usados para hacer una casa.</string>
          </description>
